name: Scrambled (itch) (PomPom Games)
description:
The goon known as "La Rata" has been causing mayhem in the barn, and its up to Omelet the chicken, equipped with her egg shooter and gliding abilities, to stop him!

Originally made for the July 2021 Egg Jam on Newgrounds, this game was made within a week by a team of 4!

Controls:

  • Move: Arrows/WASD
  • Jump: Z/J
  • Shoot: X/K
  • Pause: Tab
  • Hold the jump button to float

Gamepad supported
